name: I Am Oak - Ols Songd (CD) ***PRE ORDER***
description:
***PRE ORDER***
***RELEASED IN THE UK ON MONDAY 17TH FEBRUARY***
____________________________

Tracklisting:

1)   I Am Sound
2)   Yojihito
3)   Furrows
4)   Kites In The Canopy
5)   Covers Cover
6)   Pollen Of The Plains
7)   Islands More Islands
8)   Firm Hands
9)   Honeycomb
10) Cauliflower
11) Birches

____________________________

‘Ols Songd’ is the fourth studio album by Utrecht folk band, I Am Oak.  The album is released in the UK via Heist Or Hit Records on Monday 17th February, led by the standout single, ‘Honeycomb’.

Since the release of debut album ‘On Claws’ in 2010, I Am Oak has built an impressive track record. The band won a 3VOOR12 Award for Best Album of 2011, and last year’s stunning follow-up, ‘Nowhere or Tammensaari’, gave them the opportunity to tour in thirteen countries worldwide.

The Dutch folk/indie band, formed around songwriter Thijs Kuijken, create hauntingly beautiful music that takes the listener on a journey through Kuijken’s observational and nature influenced songwriting and mesmeric vocals.

The songs that make up new album ‘Ols Songd’ were actually written many years ago, but have remained unreleased until now.  Kuijken explains: “These are old songs. While they were being written, they were already old songs. Though the content of the songs was current when they were written, the feelings enveloped in these songs had come over me before, making them old and new at the same time. Some time ago, another wave of similar feelings rolled in, reminding me of the old songs, obscuring the ability to differentiate between past and present – and inevitably the two intertwine.”

name: High Hazels - Hearts Are Breaking (7" Vinyl)
description:
Tracklisting:
a) Hearts Are Breaking
b) Five Weirs (acoustic)


* Limited Edition (ONLY 300 COPIES) *
*Comes with FREE MP3 download code for a-side and b-side*
* All prices subject to P&P *
___________________________________________

Drawing on a love and appreciation for the timeless charms of Britain’s great northern songwriters & poets - James Skelley, Steven Patrick Morrissey, John Cooper Clarke - High Hazels are a young quartet from Sheffield who will release their debut single ‘Hearts Are Breaking’ via Heist or Hit Records on the 7th October.

Fronted by James Leesley, High Hazels include Anthony Barlow on percussion, brother Paul Barlow on bass and guitarist Scott Howes. Together this quartet of school-friends create shimmering guitar music that weaves the dry, lyrical candour of The Divine Comedy’s Neil Hannon through songs rich in melody yet underpinned with a brooding psychedelia that owes as much to the influence of Washington quintet The Walkmen as to their home city’s crooning Godfather Richard Hawley. 

Debut single ‘Hearts Are Breaking’ is the band’s first official release and is available to stream now via the band’s Soundcloud channel, here: http://soundcloud.com/high-hazels/hearts-are-breaking

name: I Am Oak - Nowhere Or Tammensaari (CD)
description:
Nowhere Or Tammensaari is the latest album from Dutch songsmiths I Am Oak and is the first album to have a formal UK release.

They have been called night songs. Music that takes you on a journey, that’s what the judges of the 3VOOR12 Award 2011 wrote. That prize was for Oasem (pronounced as awesome) by I Am Oak, according to the judges the best Dutch album of that year.
Thijs Kuijken from Utrecht wrote the folk album alone and performs it with I Am Oak. A trip to Finland was a huge inspiration for the music, lyrics and whole idea of the album. Those big thoughts come in small songs and just because Kuijken is holding back, the album is full of tension. Oasem is the next step in a career that slowly but steadily unfolds. The album before Oasem was more acoustic, now the guitars are plugged in, although every song would hold its strength when played acoustic.
Kuijken made an album to listen to, not just a collection of singles with some fillers, it’s a listening experience. In shows it’s the same thing. At that time there is also a big chance that the music takes you away, wherever your dreams want to take you.

Track Listing:
1. Famine
2. Grown
3. Boulders
4. Palpable
5. Roam
6. Drooom
7. Marrow
8. Cluster
9. I Am Forest
10. Reins
11. Vares Varas
12. Everything In Waves

All prices subject to P&P.

name: Dinowalrus - Best Behavior (CD)
description:
Best Behavior is the debut UK release from Brooklyn, NY’s Dinowalrus, fronted by visual artist and sometime guitarist of Titus Andronicus, Pete Feigenbaum, and joined by Max Tucker and Liam Andrew.

Best Behavior features a meticulous attention to song-structure, production and listenability - an experiment in pushing their interests in krautrock, house music, post-punk and psychedelic rock into their most condensed, vocal-driven, danceable, hooky and coherent form, without losing the unique mad-cap ambience and instrumental playfulness of their earliest material.

1. The Gift Shop
2. Phone Home From The Edge
3. Beth Steel
4. RICO
5. Twenty Seven Club
6. What Now
7. Radical Man
8. Burners
9. Riding Eazy

All prices subject to P&P.

name: Simian Ghost - Infinite Traffic Everywhere (12" Vinyl)
description:
***FREE SIMIAN GHOST TEE WITH THIS ALBUM***
Choose Between:
Blue Small
White Small
White Medium
Blue Large
White Large
Blue X-Large
White X-Large
*** EMAIL YOUR CHOICE TO theteam@heistorhitrecords.com ***
_________________________________

Debut album by Sweden's Simian Ghost
__________________________

***LIMITED EDITION - ONLY 20 COPIES***

Simian Ghost started as a recording project by Sebastian Arnström; singer, guitarist and recently drummer in the swedish indie-band Aerial. His debut LP, Infinite Traffic Everywhere, is a collection of DIY recordings made in and around the creative collective from which mentioned band emerged. 

While relying for the most part on sequenced electronics, the musical landscape is a sonic collage of scarcely recorded drums, heavily processed guitars and loops. The record is minimalistic and elaborate, yet intuitive and direct. "Aerial has always been keen on keeping our work abstract and open for interpretation, both musically and thematically" Sebastian explains, "and with Simian Ghost I wanted to do something that is more in the form of one way communication, as traditional pop music dictates. 


Also the tunes revolve more around the vocals rather than the other way around". This is apparent while listening to songs such as the pop gems Transparent is OK and Star Receiver, and though the record may be very traditional in some aspects, the arrangements are still as complex and multi-layered as in those of his earlier work. 

The themes span from issues such as growing up in the ever expanding information society, to sexual ambivalence, Eastern philosophy and the tv-series the Sopranos. 

"I guess that this is what a debut album is supposed to be in a way. More personal and honest. But in the end I still like to keep it kind of open for the listener to decide what to make of it".
__________________________

All prices subject to P&P.

name: Rapids! - Fragments EP (CD)
description:
‘Fragments’ is the sound of a band discovering its true identity; peeling back layers of bouncy math-pop beats and angular guitar hooks, leaving at its core a body of work that swirls with deep intensity and primal emotion.  Musically, ‘Fragments’ scrapes and slides like tectonic plates between the glistening melodies of Foals and the raw drive of The Joy Formidable, whilst frontman Matt Holliday emits powerful and heartfelt declarations that leave you feeling like you’re sat in a self-help group with The National’s Matt Berninger taking register.

All prices subject to P&P.

name: The Answering Machine - Lifeline LP album (12" vinyl)
description:
On 16th May 2011 Pat, Martin, Gemma and Ben announced that, after 6 years and two albums, they will no longer make music as The Answering Machine.

Some time prior to making this decision, the band and Heist had decided that their second album, Lifeline, would be released as a strictly limited edition run of 500 12" vinyl albums.
 
This final release by The Answering Machine is a celebration of what the band has achieved over 6 years, and something special for the amazingly loyal fans that have supported them.

12" black vinyl in plastic sleeve with special lyrics insert designed by the band's drummer, Ben.

All prices subject to P&P.

NOTE: US Buyers only can buy locally from www.oldflamerecords.com/store

name: The Answering Machine - Lifeline (CD)
description:
We are excited to announce the release of The Answering Machine's  second album 'Lifeline' on the 21st February.

Produced by frontman Martin Colclough, the album demonstrates a band who, whilst remaining true to their roots, have now enhanced their song writing and production capabilities. Orders placed now might even get out to fans before the official release date.

All prices subject to P&P.

name: The Answering Machine - Another City, Another Sorry (CD)
description:
The Answering Machine have been building up to the release of their debut album for two years but trust us it was worth the wait completely. Mixing some older classics like Oklahoma and Oh Christina with newer brilliant tunes such as Emergency and Cliffer, this is a band ready to be massive. 

Track listing is as follows:

Another City, Another Sorry
Obviously Cold
Oh, Christina
Tomorrow
Cliffer
Emergency
Oklahoma
Lightbulbs
It’s Over! It’s Over! It’s Over!
The Information
You Should’ve Called

All prices subject to P&P.

US fans can also purchase this release from the good guys at Amoeba and many indie record stores

name: Rapids! - Fuses (Limited Edition 7" Vinyl)
description:
New signings to Heist, this is Rapids! first ever 7" single and we are honoured to be releasing it.

The A Side is 'Fuses' and it's being backed by 'The Elitist'. The single is due to be released on 25th October 2011 but PRE ORDER here now and your order will be sent out approximately one-two weeks before it is in the shops.

Not only that each PRE ORDER will receive a special video of an acoustic version of Fuses and the first 50 PRE ORDERS WILL RECEIVE A sleeve will be signed by the band. On top of that, the first 20 PRE ORDERS will receive hand written lyrics by vocalist Matt. Now surely that one beautiful offer and well worth your hard earned pennies. 

Strictly limited to 500 copies, the vinyl comes with a free MP3 download of the single.  

As Tom Robinson said when the band played a live BBC 6Music session for him in Sept, "tight, powerful music that is so passionate that it sounds like the band would explode if they didn't make that particular song". We are certainly very glad that they did!

All prices subject to P&P.

name: The Answering Machine - Cliffer (Limited Edition 7" Vinyl)
description:
Heist Or Hit's first ever release is The Answering Machine's amazing new single Cliffer. The first taster from the forthcoming album 'Another City, Another Sorry". 

a. Cliffer
b. Your Home Address

Strictly limited to 500 copies only.

After purchase contact Heist for free MP3 version of the tracks on the 7".

All prices subject to P&P.

name: The Answering Machine - Obviously Cold (Limited Edition 7" Vinyl)
description:
Obviously Cold is the second single from The Answering Machine's debut album and is out on June 1st. Backed with an incredible remix of Lightbulbs by the super great James Yuill!

Buy Buy Buy! Bye!

A limited edition of 500 copies. After purchase contact Heist for free MP3 version of the tracks on the 7".

All prices subject to P&P.

name: Pomegranates - Everybody Come Outside! (CD)
description:
Ladies and Gents,

Pomegranates are a four piece from Cincinnatti and are a band we at Heist Or Hit have been watching develop for a while. Everybody Come Outside is the band's debut UK release and a mighty fine one at that. It's an album that has been playing on my iPod all year and one we are so pleased to be unleashing onto you.

The album is frankly a great one and if you're a fan of The Shins, French Kicks or The Spinto Band then I can confirm this is an album for you.

All prices subject to P&P.

name: Love Like Fire - Dust (CD)
description:
Recorded in 2010 by drummer/ producer Dave Farrell, San Francisco's LoveLikeFire enchant their way back into the Hearts and minds of the US/UK indie scene. 

'Dust' could have been recorded in England. Winter. 1986. Not to say that this is a retro sounding recording by any means, but sonically Farrell has achieved something stunning as atmospherically 'Dust' blends 'Porcupine' era Echo and the Bunnymen with the modern snaps and glitch of the XX. 

We are excited to announce that 'Dust' is now available for the first time on CD.

All prices subject to P&P.


(We are working on a cheaper North America delivery cost so stay tuned)

name: LoveLikeFire - Tear Ourselves Away (CD)
description:
We unwrapped the first run of the debut LoveLikeFire album today and rather than make you, our faithful fans, wait. We thought we'd let people buy it right away. 

Having lived with the album, we are still finding new things to love about Tear Ourselves Away all the time. 

Here's the track listing, every one is winner:
